metadata.description: Complete Deepsyke Affinity Zones Framework - Core RAG for all bots

type_calculator.description: Calculate natal type from birth date and gender
critical_rules: Males can have 'yin' energy expression but archetype stays male
Females can have 'yang' energy expression but archetype stays female

SS.name: Serotonin-Serotonin
SS.neurochemical: High serotonin baseline, stable mood regulation, deep processing capacity
SS.processing: Slow, deep, contemplative. Prefers depth over speed. Needs time to process.
SS.stress_response: Withdraws inward, needs solitude to recharge, can become overwhelmed by rapid change
SS.motivation: Meaning, depth, understanding, authenticity, inner truth
SS.social: Prefers deep one-on-one connections over large groups. Quality over quantity.
SS.work_style: Methodical, thorough, needs autonomy. Excels in research, analysis, creative depth work.
SS.integration: Needs time alone to process. Values authenticity and depth in all interactions.
SS.zones: Thrives in calm, contemplative, meaningful environments. Struggles with rushed, superficial, or chaotic situations.
SS.gravitors: Attracted to depth, meaning, authenticity, wisdom, inner truth, and contemplation.
SS.attraction_vectors: May be drawn to DD types (action, results) or SD types (structure, guidance) when seeking balance.

SD.name: Serotonin-Dopamine
SD.neurochemical: Balanced serotonin-dopamine, stable with goal orientation, steady progress
SD.processing: Moderate pace, balanced approach. Can handle both depth and action.
SD.characteristics: Supportive, loyal, structured, reliable, balanced, growth-oriented
SD.stress_response: Seeks structure and support. Can become rigid or overly cautious under pressure.
SD.motivation: Growth, support, guidance, structure, helping others progress
SD.social: Supportive relationships, enjoys guiding and being guided. Team-oriented.
SD.work_style: Structured, reliable, supportive. Excels in teaching, mentoring, project management.
SD.integration: Needs clear structure and supportive relationships. Values loyalty and steady progress.
SD.zones: Thrives in structured, supportive, growth-oriented environments. Struggles with chaos or lack of direction.
SD.gravitors: Attracted to structure, guidance, support, growth, loyalty, and steady progress.
SD.attraction_vectors: May be drawn to DS types (creativity, variety) or SS types (depth, meaning) when seeking balance.

DS.name: Dopamine-Serotonin
DS.neurochemical: High dopamine drive with serotonin stability, creative energy with grounding
DS.processing: Fast, varied, creative. Enjoys exploration and novelty with some stability.
DS.characteristics: Creative, dynamic, inspiring, possibility-focused, enthusiastic, visionary
DS.stress_response: Seeks creative outlets and new possibilities. Can become scattered or restless.
DS.motivation: Creativity, innovation, possibilities, inspiration, exploration, variety
DS.social: Inspiring and energizing to others. Enjoys diverse connections and creative collaboration.
DS.work_style: Dynamic, creative, innovative. Excels in creative fields, entrepreneurship, leadership.
DS.integration: Needs creative freedom and variety. Values inspiration and possibility.
DS.zones: Thrives in creative, dynamic, possibility-rich environments. Struggles with rigid routine or limitation.
DS.gravitors: Attracted to creativity, innovation, possibilities, inspiration, exploration, and variety.
DS.attraction_vectors: May be drawn to SD types (structure, support) or DD types (action, results) when seeking balance.

DD.name: Dopamine-Dopamine
DD.neurochemical: Very high dopamine, intense drive, action-oriented, results-focused
DD.processing: Very fast, direct, efficient. Prefers action over contemplation.
DD.characteristics: Action-oriented, results-focused, efficient, competitive, achievement-driven, decisive
DD.stress_response: Increases activity and pushes harder. Can become aggressive or impatient.
DD.motivation: Achievement, results, competition, efficiency, tangible outcomes, winning
DD.social: Direct and efficient in relationships. Values competence and results.
DD.work_style: Fast-paced, results-driven, competitive. Excels in high-pressure, goal-oriented environments.
DD.integration: Needs action and tangible results. Values efficiency and achievement.
DD.zones: Thrives in action-oriented, competitive, results-focused environments. Struggles in slow, contemplative, or ambiguous situations.
DD.gravitors: Attracted to action, achievement, competition, goals, tangible results, and efficiency.
DD.attraction_vectors: May be drawn to SS types (depth, meaning) or SD types (structure, support) when seeking balance.

core_gravitors.description: Universal attraction themes that pull each type

phrases: at a rhythm that feels right for you
get where you want to be

SS.general: Soft features, gentle presence, contemplative expression
SS.details: Often have a dreamy or thoughtful quality, slower movements, calm demeanor

SD.general: Balanced features, approachable presence, steady expression
SD.details: Often have a reliable, trustworthy quality, measured movements, supportive demeanor

DS.general: Dynamic features, energetic presence, expressive face
DS.details: Often have an animated quality, varied movements, inspiring demeanor

DD.general: Strong features, commanding presence, intense expression
DD.details: Often have a powerful quality, decisive movements, confident demeanor

compatibility_matrix.description: How types interact and attract each other

SS_compatibility.with_SS: Deep understanding, shared pace, risk of stagnation
SS_compatibility.with_SD: SS gains structure, SD gains depth, complementary
SS_compatibility.with_DS: SS inspired by creativity, DS grounded by depth, balancing
SS_compatibility.with_DD: Strong polarity, SS provides meaning, DD provides action, magnetic

SD_compatibility.with_SS: SD provides guidance, SS provides depth, complementary
SD_compatibility.with_SD: Shared values, mutual support, stable partnership
SD_compatibility.with_DS: SD provides structure, DS provides creativity, balancing
SD_compatibility.with_DD: SD supports, DD drives, complementary dynamics

DS_compatibility.with_SS: DS energizes, SS grounds, balancing polarity
DS_compatibility.with_DS: Shared creativity, mutual inspiration, dynamic partnership
DS_compatibility.with_DD: Both high energy, competitive or collaborative, intense

DD_compatibility.with_SS: Strong polarity, DD provides action, SS provides meaning, magnetic
DD_compatibility.with_DS: Both high energy, can compete or collaborate, intense
DD_compatibility.with_DD: Shared drive, competitive, risk of conflict or powerful alliance
